message: PDF extracted and project created successfully

project.title: Brand Identity Project Brief
project.description: An early-stage tech startup disrupting e-commerce with AI-powered recommendations requires a complete brand identity ASAP for an upcoming investor pitch in three weeks.
project.result: A comprehensive visual identity system ready for an investor pitch, including logo, guidelines, and social media assets.

ai_researched_costs.software_needed: Adobe Creative Cloud (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign), Figma Professional
ai_researched_costs.equipment_requirements: High-color accuracy monitor (100% sRGB), Mid-to-high spec laptop (16GB RAM minimum), Graphics tablet (optional but recommended for custom iconography)

market_research.comparable_rates: Upwork Cambodia: $15-$45/hr; Local Senior Freelancers: $25-$35/hr; Entry-level/Junior: $8-$15/hr; Local Agencies: $1,500+ per brand package.

adjustments.reason: Standard median rate for mid-level freelance graphic designers in Phnom Penh.
Technical requirement for AI-startup positioning and specific non-blue color system exploration.
Standard 10% discount for early-stage startups to build long-term relationship and portfolio value.
3-week deadline for a full system (vs. typical 6-week timeline) requires priority scheduling and potential weekend work.

sources: Upwork - Freelance Graphic Designers in Phnom Penh (Feb 2026)
Khmer24 - Adobe Creative Cloud Licensing Promotions Cambodia
Pelprek/BongThom - Local Graphic Design Salary Benchmarks ($600-$1000/mo avg for mid-level)
DesignRush - Comprehensive Branding Package Hourly Estimations
Akrivi - Logo & Identity System Time Breakdown Report
pricing.disclaimer: This estimate reflects current freelance market trends in Cambodia for early 2026. Actual pricing may vary based on the specific designer's portfolio depth and the final number of revision rounds requested by the founders.
